## DEFAULT\_TIMEOUT\_MS variable

Default timeout in ms.

Represents overall timeout. If all the files are not loaded within this time frame, callback will be called with an Error as th first argument.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
DEFAULT_TIMEOUT_MS = 300
```
